body: A 28% drop happened in three days as investors expect Congress to vote soon on the Ocean Shipping Act of 2022
created_at: which will ban carriers from leaving U.S. ports with empty containers.

body: ZIM’s revenues will not be hurt by the new act. The company operates on a global scale. It can reallocate its vessels to benefit from the market condition.
Also
created_at: 43% of the company’s trade exposure by carried TEU is immune to the Ocean Shipping Act of 2022.
